title: Pantry Closet, Community Clubhouse, Prime Location
posting_body: ['Located in Southfield, Michigan, Radius at Ten Mile is a beautiful community that you would be proud to call home.', 'Our exceptional apartments and impressive community amenities paired with our gracious team will surpass all of your expectations.', 'Property Amenities:', 'Private Patio, Juliet Balcony or Full Balcony in Most Apartments', 'Quartz Kitchen Countertops', 'Online Resident Portal', 'Gas Fireplaces in Many Models', 'Swimming Pool', 'Pet Friendly', 'Prime Location', 'Exterior Vented Kitchen Exhaust', 'Community Clubhouse', 'Top Floor Lofts with Vaulted Ceilings and Skylights', 'Modern Backsplash', 'Spacious 9’ Ceilings with Open Concept Floorplans', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of your exact home.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!', 'Professionally managed by GoldOller Real Estate Investments, a provider of Fair Housing and Equal Opportunity.']
